body.p: Suggesting a day for a meeting… I really do not see (having done my day’s work, and [not] seeing at all) why I should wait for my daughter Mary’s return, to answer your kind note. Shall it be (this looks as if I were asking you to “name the day” in a more tender reference) on Saturday week...
